DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare sensitivity of visceral pain in the esophagus using different pain stimuli.
DOC.brief_title: Esophageal Hypersensitivity Study in Patients With Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
DOC.criteria: Provision of signed informed consent form BMI 18.535.0, inclusive Continuous PPI treatment for GERD during the last 4 weeks Patients that have not experienced any GERD symptoms improvement at all after PPI treatment Unstable or clinically significant disorders including cardiovascular, respiratory, renal, hepatic, metabolic, psychiatric, other gastrointestinal and esophageal disorders besides GERD Prior surgery of the upper GI tract
